product_name: Arc'teryx Ceva Insulated Hoodie Jacket - Women's
long_description: The Arc'teryx Ceva hoodie is a versatile, lightweight insulated jacket designed to be worn as either a cold weather mid layer or as a stand-alone piece in cold, dry conditions. Moisture- and wind-resistant mini ripstop outer fabric; 80g Coreloft(TM) synthetic insulation is breathable, compressible and lightweight. Inset panels of stretch fabric under the arms stop just above the hip for an extended range of motion that doesn't compromise warmth. Smooth inner face-fabric allows for easy layering; non-quilted, laminated construction eliminates cold spots. Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. Insulated hood has stretch binding for a soft fit around face. Full front zip with insulated wind flap; microsuede-lined collar and chin guard add comfort. Stretch wrist gussets and dropped drawcord hem maximize protection. Anatomic shaping ensures a comfortable fit; articulated patterning enhances mobility. Hand pockets have hidden zippers; includes an internal chest pocket. Arc'teryx Ceva hoodie has a trim fit.
